title: "Fractal Wallpapers"
content: Welcome to our website, where you can find a collection of stunning wallpapers featuring mesmerizing abstract shapes inspired by the Mandelbrot set. Our monochromatic color scheme adds a touch of elegance and simplicity to your desktop or mobile device. Whether you're looking for a new wallpaper to freshen up your screen or want to add a unique touch to your design project, our collection has something for everyone. Browse through our gallery and download your favorite wallpapers today!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a repeating pattern of abstract shapes inspired by the Mandelbrot set, in a monochromatic color scheme."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
